channel.title: SOFA - RSS Update Feed
channel.description: Simple Organized Feed for Apple Software Updates - Security releases and updates

item.title: XProtect Security Framework Bundle Update
item.description: XProtect Security Framework updated: Configuration (5313), Remediator (153), Gatekeeper Configuration (140), Malware Removal Tool (MRT) (1.93), Plugin Service (74)
